title: Program for Raising Awareness of Library and Information Science Majors through Inquiry-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Online collaborative learning environment for library and information science majors to explore core competencies in actual LIS fields and enhance major comprehension

learning_goals: Classifies and explains major subfields of library and information science (metadata, information architecture, knowledge management, etc.) with 80%+ accuracy
Analyze and propose solutions to at least three real-world problem cases in the LIS field through IBL (Inquiry-Based Learning) activities
Conduct at least five career exploration activities related to the major through learning portfolio assessments

resources: Access to Digital Library Practice Platform

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
